Description: Heartbeat signal to monitor communication and ensure the controller is active and responsive.
Current operating mode of the EZA controller (e.g., grid-following, grid-forming, standby).
Target value for active power output or input (in kW) set by the controller.
Target value for reactive power output or input (in kVAR) set by the controller.
Desired power factor for grid compliance or optimization.
Control strategy for reactive power (e.g., fixed, voltage-dependent, power factor control).
Maximum power available for charging based on system limits and SOC (in kW).
Maximum power available for discharging based on system limits and SOC (in kW).
Total energy capacity available for charging (in kWh).
Total energy capacity available for discharging (in kWh).
Actual active power currently being delivered or absorbed by the system (in kW).
Power reserved or delivered for Frequency Containment Reserve (FCR) service.
Power reserved or delivered for Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve (aFRR) service.
Power consumed internally by the plant or auxiliary systems (in kW).
State of Charge of the entire system as managed by the EZA controller (in %).
Indicates readiness to provide FCR service (boolean or status flag).
Indicates whether FCR service is currently active (boolean or status flag).
Indicates readiness to provide aFRR service (boolean or status flag).
Indicates whether aFRR service is currently active (boolean or status flag).
